text: Radlin is a town in Wodzisław County, Silesian Voivodeship, Poland, with about 17,673 people (2004). == Sports == * Górnik Radlin - men's volleyball team playing in Polish Volleyball League (Polska Liga Siatkówki, PLS: Seria B in 2003/2004, Seria A in 2004/2005 season). Category:Towns in Silesian Voivodeship
title: Radlin
